title: Welcome to the Poro Masters Collection

replies.body:
One day Riot will release another IP icon




Kappa

Why you do dis To Me Riot,
 If only we could trade in icons. . .

Sooner or later, someone is gonna make a "Spider Dog" spinoff.
u can only guess
Spider Poro.

Unfortunately i don't got the animating skills/programs to do it.

Literally the cutest icons I've ever seen

http://apollo-pbe-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1436160361/profileIcon871.png

♡.♡
there has got to be another way to get icons without using rp lol
They are releasing Hextech Crafting, so don't be too saddened that this is an RP only thing {{champion:32}}
